India do hereby take oath and solemnly affirm as under : - herein. 1. That the deponent is well acquintted with the facts deposed born 2. That the deponent is a native and citizen of India. He was on 2nd Sep 1910 at Bareilly (U.P.) India. 3. That Mr. Dharmendra Swaroop S/o Mr. Mahesh Swroop and Late Mrs. Om Wati is well known to me. I have known him and his entire family since my child hood. 4. That I know that Dharmendra Swaroop was born onJuly 10, 1937 at Bareilly (U.P.) . At the time of his birth, Dharmendra Swaroop's parents Mr. Mahesh Swaroop and Late Mrs. Om Wati Devi and my family lived in the same neighberhood and in the same town. 5. That my family was invited to the celebration marking Dharm&ndra's birth and I alongwith my family attended the celebration and his haptism in accordance with the Hindu religion. That the deponent is well acquentted with the faats contained herein. there Deponent That the contents of the above paras are true to my personal knowledge and belief. Nothing is false nor any thing is concealed herin. 11.10.94 So help me God. Verified at Bareilly (U.P.) India on . ll. K.,Prime Identified INDIA Nazayan 11.10.94. Deponent.
